title: Windows Loader v2.2.2-Daz
description:
Description:
=================

This is the loader application that's used by millions of people worldwide, well known for passing Microsoft's WAT (Windows Activation Technologies) and is arguably the safest Windows activation exploit ever created. The application itself injects a SLIC (System Licensed Internal Code) into your system before Windows boots; this is what fools Windows into thinking itÃƒÂ¢Ã‚â‚¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s genuine.

=================

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ It works on 32-bit and 64-bit systems
